hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated by Mu'awiya with the same chain of transmitters but with this exception that in this the words of Mu'awiya:" It has been conveyed to me..." have not been mentioned

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ قِرَاءَةِ الْقُرْآنِ وَسُورَةِ الْبَقَرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of reciting the Qur’an and Surat al-Baqarah
